subject: Tennis
BNP Paribas Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Djokovic booked a spot in the BNP Paribas Open final first, beating No. 4 Andy Murray, 6-2, 6-3, and Federer followed by topping Milos Raonic, 7-5, 6-4.
snippet: Djokovic booked a spot in the BNP Paribas Open final first, beating No. 4 Andy Murray, 6-2, 6-3, and Federer followed by topping Milos Raonic, 7-5, 6-4.
